text: Futhi sabahlukanisa babayizizwe eziyishumi nambili futhi sembulela uMose ngenkathi abantu bakhe bemcela amanzi (sathi) shaya ngenduku yakho idwala ngakho-ke kwaphophoza kulona imithombo eyishumi nambili, bonke abantu bayazi indawo yabo yokuphuza futhi sabenzela umthunzi ngamafu futhi sabathumelela imana nezigcwaca dlanini ezintweni ezinhle esinabele zona futhi abazange basilimaze ngalutho kepha imiphefumulo yabo abayilima zayo
